title: Infused Analytics Everywhere
subtitle: Embed built analytics to your existing applications dynamically
description: Sisense is specifically designed to infuse your built data analytics to your very own applications while maintaining their unique look & feel. Whether you have no coding experience or have a dedicated coding team, Sisense supports no-code & pro-code approach, allows you to embed dashboards & charts seamlessly either using simple iFrames or using dynamically configurable SDKs.

1.title: Embed analytics to your apps
1.description: Sisense can be integrated into other applications and platforms, allowing businesses to embed AI-powered analytics directly into their products or services. This is particularly useful for software companies and organizations that want to provide data-driven insights to their users.

2.title: Support both code-first & code-free
2.description: Dashboards can be created via Sisense UI with simple drag-and-drop then embedded to your applications using iFrames; or you can fully customize the way analytics present in your apps by using Sisense's unique developer-friendly SDKs.
